column1: The  Learned  Chief  Magistrate  of  Colombo

column2: 20/05/2016, openly allowed any party who has an interest with regard

column1: to the rights of animals to appear and make submissions in the case No.

column2: B23073/15. The Chief Magistrate did not make any party or a body, a

column1: party  to  the  aforesaid  case.  It was  submitted  that  the  counsel  who
appeared on 20/05/2016 made submission on behalf of the Center for
Eco-cultural  Studies and not on behalf of the Intervenient-Petitioners
